name: The Archives
hours: Monday to Friday 1600 - 0200 Saturday and Sunday 1200 - 0200
notes: Bar with old arcade games! Great selection of Pacman/Galaga-era games, 90s games (TMNT arcade game, Simpsons arcade game, etc.) and pinball. Token machine accepts both cash and card. Give the Peach Emoji (buffalo trace bourbon, becherovka, peach, honey, lemon) a try!
